reviewText: I read the other reviewer's opinion and I admit to a blush and a chuckle.  While I cannot argue with what was written in that review, my 4yo son dearly loves this video, and as a result enthusiastically tells friends and strangers all about subduction and lava volcanoes and about the layers of the earth from core to crust.  Being sci-fi fans my husband and I also chuckle at the goofy in-jokes.
